column4: im getting my ass kicked...my system keeps "freezing up" anfd i cannot find error in /var/ log files ....any advice?
no...i do different things and my system, freezes at different times
and nothing in the logs, no panic.  that's tough to find.
yeah still looking through the logs...but to be honest i dont really know what to look for
anything unusual.  check messages and also syslog
I realize that "anything unusual" isn't too helpful if you don't know what is usual.
i only use it for yahoo and aolim
I haven't seen problems reported with those.  Doesn't necessarily mean there aren't any, but I haven't seen them.
try running the memory test.  It's the most common reason for systems to hang.
go back to debian for a while.   if it still doesn't crash, then you'll know
i went back to my windows xp and it didnt hang or freeze
but running debian is a better test.
oh, so if a machine hangs, we should advise people to install open office.  :)
